title: Gems From The Nashville Craigslist: Haiku Hotel
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Hidden away beneath the many intricate layers of Craigslist, there lies a forgotten land of haiku. Many people overlook the Haiku Hotel, but it’s one of the best places to visit on Craigslist. We encourage you to create your own haiku and leave it in the comments (and at Haiku Hotel). An inspirational exchange to get you started…

SUV 07/10 15:50:05 

off-road vehicle 
i only drive you on roads 
give me back my gas

Shametrain revisited 07/10 18:50:29

I ride the bus, now– 
–no longer called the “shame train”– 
–a sensible ride! 

If you’re feeling more creative than a haiku, you could venture over to the Limericks forum and stir things up a bit. We love Craigslist.
